rules_text:
Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
When Benthic Subduer enters, tap target creature you don’t control. If you control a Crab, Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, Serpent, or Shark, put a stun counter on that creature. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Judge’s Pet

Pet was the most narrow card in the set and I wanted blue to have an extra flash creature. Recpie Thief moved to the 4MV slot.
